channel.title: Comments on: 1529 N. Winona Blvd
channel.description: Blogging demolitions one building at a time.

item.title: By: TK
item.dc:creator: TK
item.description: Is there anywhere that public can write to protest? I don't know anything about regulations and wouldn't be able to come up with any good arguments other than saying this is an architectural treasure.
item.content:encoded: Is there anywhere that public can write to protest? I don’t know anything about regulations and wouldn’t be able to come up with any good arguments other than saying this is an architectural treasure.

item.title: By: Bea
item.dc:creator: Bea
item.description: I can’t believe how short sighted it is to tear down this historic gem. At what point do we stop looking at the bottom line and do the right thing? Deplorable!
item.content:encoded:
I can’t believe how short sighted it is to tear down this historic gem. At what point do we stop looking at the bottom line and do the right thing?
Deplorable!
